Widget.name: Explain Match
Widget.Description: Display Index6 match explanation. The explanation shows a graphical representation on the query that highlights the matching parts of the query and gives more information as to why each part has matched. This includes positions, ranking keys, transformed query operators and their arguments and options. 'hit_info' must contain 'ast' in feed advanced parameters.

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Expanded by default
Option.Description: Defines whether matches are to be explained by default.

Option.name: Display node arguments
Option.Description: Defines whether to display arguments for each node (arguments correspond to node-specific information, e.g. 'word' for #alphanum).

Option.name: Display node positions
Option.Description: Defines whether to display word positions for each node.

Option.name: Display node options
Option.Description: Defines whether to display options for each node.

Option.name: Display node ranking keys
Option.Description: Defines whether to display the value of each ranking key for each node.
